title: Ep. 131: Live From SXSW
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Sean Fennessey host a live discussion on the latest trends in the film industry and the must-see movies being premiered at SXSW (0:30). They also take audience questions about the shifting landscape of media and entertainment (34:20).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
